name: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: 1/2 cup Parmesan Cheese, freshly grated (for serving)
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside, reserving a cup of pasta water.
In a large pan, heat 2 tbsp olive oil over medium heat. Add the finely chopped onion, garlic, grated carrot, and chopped celery. Sauté for about 5-7 minutes until softened.
Add 500g ground beef to the pan. Cook, stirring frequently, until the meat is browned and fully cooked, breaking it up into smaller pieces.
Stir in 2 tbsp tomato paste and cook for 1-2 minutes to deepen the flavor.
Add 1 can (400g) of crushed tomatoes, 1 tsp dried oregano, 1 tsp dried basil, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, and 1/2 cup red wine (if using). Stir well to combine.
Bring the sauce to a simmer and let it cook for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally. If the sauce gets too thick, add a bit of the reserved pasta water to reach the desired consistency.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the Bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti. Garnish with freshly chopped parsley and grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: 2 large heads Romaine Lettuce (about 12 cups, chopped)
½ cup freshly grated Parmesan Cheese (or shaved)
2 Egg Yolks (or 2 tbsp mayonnaise for eggless version)
¾ cup extra virgin Olive Oil
¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan Cheese (for dressing)
instructions: Wash and dry the romaine lettuce thoroughly.
Chop or tear the lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place it in a large salad bowl.
Prepare croutons: Cut 2 cups of day-old bread into cubes, toss with 1-2 tbsp olive oil, salt, pepper, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10-12 minutes until golden and crispy.
For the dressing, whisk together 2 egg yolks, minced garlic, 4 anchovy fillets (or 1 tbsp anchovy paste), 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp Dijon mustard, and 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce.
Slowly drizzle in ¾ cup olive oil while whisking continuously to create an emulsion. Add water if the dressing is too thick.
Stir in ¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese and season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Toss the chopped lettuce with half of the dressing to coat it evenly.
Add croutons and ½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese on top.
Toss the salad gently and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook the fettuccine pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside, reserving some pasta water.

Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Cook the chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until browned and fully cooked. Let it rest for a few minutes before slicing into strips.
In the same pan, add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add 1 cup of heavy cream, 1/4 cup of butter, and bring it to a simmer. Stir occasionally.
Once the sauce thickens slightly, stir in 1/2 cup of freshly grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Add the cooked fettuccine to the pan, tossing it in the sauce until fully coated.
Serve the pasta with sliced chicken on top and garnish with freshly chopped parsley.
Enjoy your creamy Chicken Alfredo!

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: In a large pan, cook the ground beef over medium heat, breaking it apart with a spatula until browned and fully cooked.
Stir in the taco seasoning and 1/2 cup of water. Simmer for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the meat.
While the beef cooks, warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave for a few seconds.
Assemble the tacos: Place a spoonful of the seasoned beef onto each tortilla.
Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, chopped red onion, shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve with lime wedges on the side for a fresh squeeze of flavor.
Enjoy your delicious Beef Tacos!

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 tbsp Cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water (optional for thicker sauce)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add the sliced red bell pepper, julienned carrot, zucchini, broccoli florets, and snap peas. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until vegetables are tender but still crisp.
Add the minced garlic and grated ginger, cooking for an additional 1 minute until fragrant.
Stir in the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and honey, and cook for another 2-3 minutes to combine the flavors.
If you prefer a thicker sauce, stir in the cornstarch mixture and cook for another 1-2 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Serve the stir fry hot, garnished with sesame seeds if desired.
Enjoy your healthy Vegetable Stir Fry!

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface into your desired shape and thickness.
Place the dough on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
Spread 1/2 cup of tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Arrange the fresh mozzarella slices evenly over the sauce.
Drizzle olive oil over the top and season with salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes (if using).
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil leaves.
Slice and serve your delicious Margherita Pizza!

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: 500g Chicken Breast or Thighs, cut into pieces
instructions: Heat 2 tbsp vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, garlic, and ginger, and cook for 5-7 minutes until softened.
Add the chicken pieces to the pot and cook for 6-8 minutes until browned on all sides.
Stir in 2 tbsp curry powder, 1 tsp turmeric, and 1 tsp cumin, cooking for 1-2 minutes to bloom the spices.
Add 1 can (400g) coconut milk, 1 can (400g) diced tomatoes, 1 tbsp tomato paste, and 1 tbsp brown sugar. Stir to combine.
Bring the curry to a simmer and cook for 20-25 minutes until the chicken is fully cooked and the sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the chicken curry with rice and garnish with freshly chopped cilantro.
Enjoy your hearty Chicken Curry!

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 500g Beef Sirloin or Tenderloin, sliced thinly
Rice or Egg Noodles, for serving
instructions: Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the sliced beef and cook for 2-3 minutes, until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add the chopped onion, minced garlic, and sliced mushrooms. Cook for 5-7 minutes until softened and browned.
Stir in 1 cup beef broth, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, and 1 tsp Dijon mustard. Bring to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes.
Lower the heat and return the beef to the pan. Stir in 1/2 cup sour cream and season with salt and pepper.
Simmer for an additional 5 minutes until the sauce is creamy and thickened.
Serve the Beef Stroganoff over rice or egg noodles, garnished with fresh parsley.
Enjoy your creamy Beef Stroganoff!

name: Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup Almond Milk (or any milk of choice)
instructions: Add the mixed berries, banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, honey, and vanilla extract to a blender.
Blend until smooth, adding ice cubes if you prefer a colder, thicker consistency.
Pour the smoothie into a glass and serve immediately.
Enjoy your refreshing Berry Smoothie!

name: Iced Coffee
ingredients: Chocolate Syrup or Caramel Syrup (optional, for drizzling)
instructions: Brew a strong cup of coffee and allow it to cool to room temperature or refrigerate to speed up the cooling process.
Fill a glass with ice cubes and pour the cooled coffee over the ice.
Add milk and sweetener of your choice and stir to combine.
Top with whipped cream if desired and drizzle with chocolate or caramel syrup for extra flavor.
Serve immediately and enjoy your chilled Iced Coffee!

name: Homemade Lemonade
ingredients: 1 cup Freshly Squeezed Lemon Juice (about 4-6 lemons)
instructions: In a small saucepan, combine 1/2 cup sugar with 1 cup of water. Heat over medium heat until the sugar is dissolved, then remove from heat and allow to cool. This is your simple syrup.
In a pitcher, combine the freshly squeezed lemon juice with the simple syrup.
Add the remaining 3 cups of cold water and stir well. Taste and adjust sweetness, adding more sugar if necessary.
Serve the lemonade over ice cubes and garnish with lemon slices.
Enjoy your refreshing Homemade Lemonade!
